body_html: That's a tricky one. I don't think we have the code running the archived app readily available: unlike the gh-pages for the public blog, we didn't fork the codebase but only the Heroku app instead. Sadly, I don't have access to the Heroku application, either 😭

body: That's a tricky one. I don't think we have the code running the archived app readily available: unlike the gh-pages for the public blog, we didn't fork the codebase but only the Heroku app instead. Sadly, I don't have access to the Heroku application, either :sob:
